name: The Fadeling And The Passageworm
description:
There are two rooms in this game. One represents the outside world and contains six heads for you to try on. The other room has nothing in it but a mirror that tells the truth.  

I wanted to experiment with the player character's perception of themselves, and I try to think of the character not as a whole, but as an ever-changing sum of influences. The "dividual" in the "individual". A first person game where the player cannot see their own legs plays very much like a dream. And just like in a dream you never know what you'd see in the mirror. I wanted to make a comforting game, a healing game. Not sure if it has worked out.

Show Attribution
